setting.title: Proforma Invoice
setting.columnlabels: Proforma Invoice No,Date,Customer Name,Terms And Condition,Subscription Code,Contact Person,Email Id,Mobile No,Total Amount,Billing Address,State,Courier Address,GSTIN,Director Name,Director Mobile,Director Email Id,Finance Name,Finance Mobile,Finance Email Id,Office Tel no,Office Email Id,Period From,Period To,Lead By,Advisory by,Meeting1,Meeting2,Closed By,CGST,SGST,IGST,GST,Taxable Amount,status
setting.query: SELECT *, (select employee_employeename from tbl_employee WHERE employee_employeeid=proformainvoice_leadbyid) as proformainvoice_leadby, (select employee_employeename from tbl_employee WHERE employee_employeeid=proformainvoice_advisorybyid) as proformainvoice_advisoryby, (select employee_employeename from tbl_employee WHERE employee_employeeid=proformainvoice_meeting1id) as proformainvoice_meeting1, (select employee_employeename from tbl_employee WHERE employee_employeeid=proformainvoice_closedbyid) as proformainvoice_closedby FROM tbl_proformainvoice LEFT JOIN tbl_client ON proformainvoice_clientid=client_clientid LEFT JOIN tbl_setupfortermsandcondition ON proformainvoice_setupfortermsandconditionid=setupfortermsandcondition_setupfortermsandconditionid LEFT JOIN tbl_subscription ON proformainvoice_subscriptionid=subscription_subscriptionid LEFT JOIN tbl_state ON proformainvoice_stateid=state_stateid LEFT JOIN tbl_salesstatus ON proformainvoice_salesstatusid=salesstatus_salesstatusid
setting.where: proformainvoice_date BETWEEN '$proformainvoice_date_from$' AND '$proformainvoice_date_to$' AND ('$proformainvoice_clientid$' = '0' OR proformainvoice_clientid = '$proformainvoice_clientid$') AND ('$proformainvoice_salesstatusid$' = '0' OR proformainvoice_salesstatusid = '$proformainvoice_salesstatusid$')
